name: Revenge of the shadow ninja
description:
Revenge of the shadow ninja is a platform game with a gloomy artistic style, you will play the role of a samurai named Shimazu.
Shimazu's son is kidnapped and his wife is killed by Takeda with the help of a demon named Fudo. For the past 10 years, Takeda has been sealed away by Shimazu, it is Shimazu's duty to take revenge and try to save his son.
Use all your skills to avoid dangerous traps. Destroy all opponents on your way to revenge.
Progress through levels by destroying your enemies with dashes and shurikens. Avoid deadly traps, collect gold and upgrade your skills.
